title: 76ers Collapse, Next Steps For Ben Simmons, Hawks Season Turnaround, Devin Bookers' Sensational Play
description:
Brian Windhorst, Doris Burke and Kirk Goldsberry discuss the state of Ben Simmons’ confidence, what is next for the 76ers, Ben’s trade value, the Hawks continuing to win road playoff games, the opportunity for the Bucks in the playoffs now, the display Devin Booker put on in Game 1 of the Western Conference Finals and Monty Williams’ coaching job this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Is Next For The 76ers? Will Ben Simmons Be In Philly Next Season?
